snippet: Rather than intentional or accidental fire from the Syrian civil war, the explosion seemed to be a terrorist attack, Israeli officials said.
lead_paragraph: Rather than intentional or accidental fire from the Syrian civil war, the explosion seemed to be a terrorist attack, Israeli officials said.

headline.main: Explosion in Golan Heights Appears to Target Israeli Troops
